section.name: DataNucleus Access Platform 2.1.3 Released
section.p: November 13th 2010- DataNucleus Access Platform 2.1.3 ("Thomson") is released. DataNucleus Access Platform provides persistence and retrieval of Java objects to/from a wide range of datastores including RDBMS, db4o, LDAP, XML, and Excel. Version 2.1.3 includes the following changes over 2.1.2

ul.li: Drop "attachPolicy" and provide complete attachment in default scenario
Couple of fixes to result handling in in-memory query evaluator
RDBMS : Allow column reuse for multiple fields of a class
RDBMS : Fix to use of subclass-table with 1-1 bidirectional relations
RDBMS : Fix to use of lengths with BLOB/CLOB on MySQL
RDBMS : Fix to index/FK creation on Derby to avoid warning messages
JPA : Outline implementation of JPA2 lock methods

section.p: This release is downloadable under an Apache 2 license from the DataNucleus community site.
